description: Fun enough for a Saturday night and easy enough for a midweek dinner, you won't be able to get enough of this rice salad-stuffed capsicum recipe.
keywords: Stuffed capsicum,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Budget,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Healthier Grilled Capsicums Stuffed with Brown Rice Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium heat. Lightly brush capsicums with half the oil. Cook capsicums, turning, for 15 minutes or until charred and tender. Set aside to cool slightly. Slice tops from each capsicum. Reserve tops. Scoop out and discard seeds and membrane.

Place lemon zest, lemon juice and remaining oil in a large bowl and whisk to combine. Season with pepper. Add rice, onion, zucchini, feta, pine nuts, currants and parsley, and toss to combine. Fill capsicums with rice mixture and top with capsiucm tops. Serve.
